example.name: nominal complement
example.text: Surely Indira comprehends the added by-law,

example.name: sentential complement
example.text: When Robin burst on stage in a Hawaiian shirt and baggy trousers, the crowd cheered and applauded --; barely able to comprehend that Robin had landed in Oz, let alone materialized before their eyes without oopla or hype.
example.arg: that Robin had landed in Oz
